text: Avoid clicking unknown or shortened links, especially in emails or DMs.
title: 🚫 Suspicious Links

text: Think twice before responding to “urgent” messages asking for money or info.
title: ⚠️ Urgent Requests

text: Check for typos and fake domains before trusting sender emails.
title: 📧 Unusual Emails

text: Be skeptical of giveaways, rewards, or job offers that seem too good to be true.
title: 🎁 Unrealistic Offers

text: Use strong passwords and enable two-factor authentication (2FA).
title: 🔐 Password Safety
